name: WP Zendesk for Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Formidable and Ninja Forms
author: CRM Perks

sections.description:
Contact Form 7 Zendesk Plugin sends form submissions from Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor Forms, Ninja Forms, Formidable Forms, Contact Form Entries and many other popular contact form plugins to zendesk when anyone submits a contact form. Learn more at crmperks.com

How to Setup

  • Go to “Zendesk Accounts” tab then add new account.
  • Go to “Zendesk Feeds” tab then create new feed.
  • Map required Zendesk fields to contact form fields.
  • Send your test entry to Zendesk.
  • Go to “Zendesk Logs” tab and verify, if entry was sent to Zendesk.

Connect Zendesk account

Connect any contact form 7 to zendesk account by simply entering zendesk API key. Additionally , you can connect multiple zendesk accounts.

Map Zendesk ticket fields

Map any contact form 7 form fields to zendsk ticket fields. Also you can map unlimited Zendesk ticket fields.

Filter contact form 7 submissions

Filter contact form 7 submissions sent to zendesk based on user input. For example , sending only those entries to zendesk which contain work email address.

Manually send to Zendesk

Send contact form 7 submissions to zendesk when someone submits a form. Later you can manually send contact form submissions to zendesk.

Zendesk logs

View a detailed log of each contact form 7 submission whether sent or not sent to Zendesk and easily resend contact form 7 submission to Zendesk.

Send Data As Zendesk ticket Notes

Send one to many contact form 7 fields as zendesk ticket notes.

Zendesk Ticket Status and Priority

Set zendesk ticket status and priority when posting contact form 7 submission to zendesk.

Why we built this plugin

Contact Form 7 and some other popular contact forms are good but you can not send contact form submissions to any crm including zendesk. You can send to any contact form(contact form 7) submissions to zendesk with this free plugin.

Premium Version Features.

Following features are available in pro version only. Contact Form Zendesk Pro.

  • Zendesk tickets tags.
  • Zendesk Custom field.
  • Zendesk Phone Number field.
  • Assign tickets to any user.
  • Zendesk tickets attachments.
  • Google Analytics Parameters and Geolocation of a visitor who submitted the form.
  • Lookup lead’s email and phone number using email and phone lookup apis.
  • 20+ premium addons

Want to send data to crm

We have Premium Extensions for 20+ CRMs.View All CRM Extensions
sections.faq:
Where can I get support?

Our team provides free support at https://www.crmperks.com/contact-us/.

Zendesk custom ticket form

You can easily create zendesk custom ticket form with this contact form 7 zendesk plugin. You can create beautifull contact forms with contact form or CRM Perks Forms then You can map contact form fields to zendesk ticket fields.

Zendesk multiple ticket forms

You can create multiple contact forms with CRM Perks Forms then map form fields to zendesk ticket fields. when anyone will submit a form , a new ticket will be created in zendesk.

Multiple ticket forms zendesk

Of Course, you can map multiple ticket forms to zendesk and set up rules for each ticket form.

zendesk contact form

You can create a new ticket in zendesk when anyone submits a contact form on your site. Additionally you can add reply to previously existing tickets in zendesk.

zendesk wordpress contact form

zendesk native widget for wordpress is good but sometimes want to send data from your existing contact form to zendesk. You can do this easily with this Conatact Form Zendesk plugin.

zendesk contact us form

You can easily add contacts in zendesk when someone submits a contact us form on your wordpress site.

zendesk create ticket form

You can create a new ticket your zendesk account when anyone submits a ticket form on your wordpress site.

zendesk custom forms

Zendesk has a form widget but sometimes you want to add a custom form on web page, you can do this easily with contact form zendesk plugin.

WPForms Zendesk

  • Easily connect WPforms to our WPForms Zendesk Integration Plugin.
  • Create feeds for any Zendesk object like Users, Tickets etc.
  • New WPForms submission will be automatically sent to your Zendesk account.

Elementor form Zendesk

  • Easily Connect Elementor forms to your Zendesk account.
  • Create a feed for any Zendesk object like Users, Tickets etc, select correct Elementor form and finally map fields in feed.
  • When someone submits Elementor form, submission will be automatically sent to your Zendesk account.
  • You can manually send any Elementor forms entry to Zendesk by clicking “send to Zendesk” button.

zendesk form integration

You can create beautifull forms with CRM Perks Forms then map form fields to zendesk ticket or user fields. When anyone submits a form , this data will be sent to zendesk.

Ninja Forms Zendesk

  • Easily connect Ninja Forms to your Zendesk account.
  • After connecting Zendesk account, create a feed for Users, Tickets etc.
  • New Ninja Forms submission will be automatically sent to your Zendesk account.
  • You can manually send any Ninja Forms entry to Zendesk by clicking “send to Zendesk” button.

Formidable Forms Zendesk

  • Connect your Zendesk account with our Zendesk plugin.
  • Create feeds for any Zendesk object like Users, Tickets etc. Select correct Formidable Form in feed.
  • New Formidable Form submission will be automatically sent to your Zendesk account.
  • You can manually send any Formidable Form entry to Zendesk by clicking “send to Zendesk” button.

zendesk custom html form

Sometimes zendesk native web form widget does not fit your need, so you can use any popular form builder then map form fields to zendesk fields.

zendesk support form / zendesk web form

You can easily create a new zendesk ticket when any submits a form on your wordpress site. This plugin supports all popular form plugins like contact form 7, CRM Perks Forms etc.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

  • fixed multiple file uploads issue.

1.1.2

  • added “disable logs” feature.
  • added elementor, wpforms and ninja forms.

1.1.1

  • added “allow new lines in description field” feature.

1.1.0

  • fixed “escape variables” issue.

1.0.9

  • fixed “escape variables” issue.

1.0.8

  • fixed “add field” button not working issue.

1.0.7

  • fixed zendesk tags.

1.0.6

  • fixed contact form 7 dropdown field.

1.0.5

  • add ticket description as internal note.
  • added formated phone numebr support for integer field.
  • fixed new lines issue in description field.

1.0.4

  • fixed “manually send entries” checkbox.

1.0.3

  • fixed wrong field Ids on 32 bit systems.

1.0.2

  • fixed phone field.

1.0.1

  • fixed upgrade notice.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
sections.screenshots:
1. Connect zendesk Account.

  2. Map zendesk fields.

  3. Zendesk logs.

  4. Send Contact form 7 entry to zendesk.

  5. Get email infomation from Full Contact(Premium feature).

  6. Get Customer geolocation, browser and OS (Premium feature).
sections.reviews:
Works great

By jimmybrown on November 1, 2023

We have been using this plugin for quite a while. It works great for our needs.

Excellent plugin and great support!

By walterkeener3 on June 6, 2023

Thank you for a fast response in helping our fields show correctly in zendesk. We had an excellent experience with the support and very happy with the plugin!

Very good plugin

By kubako on October 21, 2020

Comfortable and easy UI to set up communication with zendesk, very nice communication logs in UI to debug complications, helpful support with responses within the next working day. For file upload to function properly another plugin of the same author is needed (is for free).

Best Support

By muhammadakbar on October 12, 2020

They give us the best support by email, i'm realy appreciate this.

Best Zendesk form plugin

By berlet on August 21, 2020

Tried many other, this is by far the best. Awesome support

Best in class!

By samuel85102 on April 30, 2020

Thanks guys for the great work you did with the plugin. I've been able to save many bucks by avoiding to pay the higher plan on ZD.

great plugin - excellent support

By ambasco on October 29, 2019

Very useful plugin. We were looking for a solution to integrate the zendesk forms in the web. We managed to get it working without any issues! We had a few questions which were answered immediately.

Pro version is amazing, fast support

By love4work on August 22, 2019

This plugin came in handy when I needed a quick way to send our forms with attachments to Zendesk. There was like 1 issue and they fixed it the next day. Only wished they would allow unlimited .localhost domains on a license for dev purposes. Edit: Though this is a Pro request so I've changed my rating to 5 stars for the free version.

Useful plugin!

By possystems on August 5, 2019

Good support, great plugin. Very useful

Great plugin and good support

By endcore on February 15, 2019

We are using this plugin for a support-ticket-form on our website. Thanks for this awesome Plugin and great support by email.
